	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room

	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.1.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:bedchamber
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 28
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 29
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 28
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 28
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 29
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 29
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 28: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.28
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 28
				scope:first_transition_1 = 28
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 28
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 29: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE -> EventsSex.ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.29
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 29
				scope:first_transition_1 = 29
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 29
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}

				scope:first_transition_0 = 32

	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room

	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden

	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows

	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber

	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}

		desc = LIDAf.4.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:study
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 34
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 35
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 34
					}
				}

					name = first_transition_1
					value = 34
				}

					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 35
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 35
				}
			}
		}
	}

		# 34: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.34
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 34
				scope:first_transition_1 = 34
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 4
		}

			name = sex_transition
			value = 34
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1

		}

			value = 4

			name = sex_transition

			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner

	# Mead in my Room?

		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.5.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:bedchamber
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 36
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 37
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 36
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 36
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 37
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 37
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 36: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_LIEGE -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.36
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 36
				scope:first_transition_1 = 36
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 5
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 36
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 37: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_LIEGE -> EventsSex.ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.37
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 37
				scope:first_transition_1 = 37
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 5
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 37
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.6 = {
	# An Intimate Discussion
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.6.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.6.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:council_chamber
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 38
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 39
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 38
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 38
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 39
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 39
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 38: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.38
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 38
				scope:first_transition_1 = 38
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 6
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 38
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 39: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.39
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 39
				scope:first_transition_1 = 39
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 6
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 39
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.7 = {
	# Taste of Heaven in Hell
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.7.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.7.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:dungeon
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 40
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 41
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 40
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 40
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 41
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 41
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 40: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.40
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 40
				scope:first_transition_1 = 40
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 7
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 40
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 41: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.41
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 41
				scope:first_transition_1 = 41
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 7
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 41
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}

		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}

LIDAf.8 = {
	# The Sweetest Torture
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.8.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.8.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:dungeon
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 42
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 43
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 42
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 42
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 43
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 43
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 42: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.42
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 42
				scope:first_transition_1 = 42
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 8
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 42
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 43: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL -> EventsSex.ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.43
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 43
				scope:first_transition_1 = 43
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 8
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 43
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}

LIDAf.9 = {
	# Who Owns Who
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.9.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.9.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:sitting_room
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 44
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 45
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 44
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 44
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 45
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 45
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 44: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.44
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 44
				scope:first_transition_1 = 44
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 9
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 44
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 45: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE -> EventsSex.ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.45
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 45
				scope:first_transition_1 = 45
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 9
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 45
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.10 = {
	# A Chance Encounter
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.10.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.10.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:courtyard
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 46
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 47
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 46
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 46
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 47
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 47
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 46: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.46
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 46
				scope:first_transition_1 = 46
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 10
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 46
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 47: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.47
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 47
				scope:first_transition_1 = 47
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 10
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 47
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
